title: It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets
snippet: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old.

title: Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum
snippet: There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words

title: The standard Lorem Ipsum passage, used since the 1500s
snippet: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
